divs: sighting detailsi was at home and my son was having trouble sleeping. so i fixed him a bottle and put him back to sleep. i stepped out the back door to smoke a cigarette, and to my surprise i saw a very bright red\orange light suspended in mid air. my first thought was a plane but it didn't move. then i thought it was a helicopter, we have helicopters all the time, but there was no sound and it wasn't moving, so i called my wife. when she came out she was very upset, she was falling a sleep when i called her out. i asked her what that was, and she said it was an airplane. and wanted to go back in the house, but the we saw a plane in the horizon moving in a straight line and with blinking lights. she decided to go back in the house to attend our son who was awaken when i called her. i noticed the stars behind the object, and were very dim that is when i realized the object was hovering very slowly, then it began to move to the right for approximately 4 seconds and then it stopped. i thought of the i.s.s or maybe a satellite, but suddenly it moved back to the left and toward me, and it stopped. i started getting nervous,at that point the object seemed move to the right again and started to fade. it looked as if it was sinking sink into the sky, until it was very small like a star and then it just displaced at a very fast speed. i still don't know what it was but i wish there was more people around to witness it.
